title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

blogname.title: The blogname
blogname.description: the parent section path. parsed but not used in mobile, if artiicle path to root, set to empty string.

published.title: The published date
published.description: The article 1st published date in iso interger.

title.title: The title
title.description: content.headlines.basic. Current article full title based on article detail page rendering logic.
examples: After three years under wraps, ex-Ald. Daniel Solis’ unprecedented deal with the feds has gone public

socialImage.title: The social Image url
socialImage.description: Cannot find logic behind this. I assume we can use og:image logic. if not possible, use empty string as default.

sourcecategory.title: The source category
sourcecategory.description: Cannot find logic behind this. Set empty string as default. no usage in mobile

sourcesection.title: The source section
sourcesection.description: Current article parent section, if artiicle path to root, set to empty string.

sourcesubsection.title: The sourcesubsection
sourcesubsection.description: Cannot fine logic hind this. Set empty string as default. no usage in mobile

sourceid.title: The source id
sourceid.description: it seems to match content.source.source_id, if no match, set to empty string. (most likely is emptystring, since we do not use source_id for our article.

channel.title: The channel
channel.description: The parent section path. Logic is same as sourcesection.

contentAuthor.title: The content Author
contentAuthor.description: ';'seprated string for name feild(content.credits.by[x].name)under content.credits.by array.

contentSource.title: The content Source
contentSource.description: Current article content source (content.source.name). 05/02: it seems source.name is mapped to distrubtor not source. so we can try to use  'canonical_website', remove - and capitalize 1st letter per word.

contentType.title: The contentType
contentType.description: current article type. return 'article' if current type is story, else return type (content.type).

contentCode.title: The content Code
contentCode.description: content.content_restrictions.content_code , if no match default to empty string.

directory.title: The directory
directory.description: Current article full section path. default to empty string if homesection.

keywords.title: The keywords
keywords.description: Keyword arrary based on content.taxonomy.seo_keywords, if no match default to empty array.

printid.title: The print id
printid.description: based on content.additional_properties.newsgate_id, if no match default to empty string.

sourceid.title: The sourceid schema
sourceid.description: it seems to match content.source.source_id, if no match, set to empty string. (most likely is emptystring, since we do not use source_id for our article.

directory.title: The directory
directory.description: Current article full section path. default to empty string if homesection.

keywords.title: The keywords
keywords.description: Keyword arrary based on content.taxonomy.seo_keywords, if no match default to empty array.

printid.title: The printid schema
printid.description: based on content.additional_properties.newsgate_id, if no match default to empty string.

leadartCredit.title: The leadartCredit
leadartCredit.description: ';'seprated string for all content.promo_items.<lead_art||basic>.credits.by[x].name. we always take lead_art 1st, then basic. if no match do not disaply.

leadartSourceid.title: The leadart Sourceid
leadartSourceid.description: value is based on content.promo_items.<lead_art||basic>.source.source_id. lead_art or basic depend on leadartCredit selection, if no match display empty string if leadartCredit exist, else do not display.

numberOfChars.title: The numberOfChars
numberOfChars.description: Number of char count in article body. default to 0 if not story type article. 05/02: sum of all char count bsed on all items mapped with #definitions/paragraph

screenType.title: The screenType schema
screenType.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

leadartCredit.title: The leadartCredit
leadartCredit.description: ';'seprated string for all content.promo_items.<lead_art||basic>.credits.by[x].name. we always take lead_art 1st, then basic. if no match do not disaply.

leadartSourceid.title: The leadart Sourceid
leadartSourceid.description: value is based on content.promo_items.<lead_art||basic>.source.source_id. lead_art or basic depend on leadartCredit selection, if no match display empty string when leadartCredit exist, else do not display.

numberOfChars.title: The numberOfChars
numberOfChars.description: Number of char count in article body. default to 0 if not story type article.

showdisplaydate.title: The showdisplaydate
showdisplaydate.description: default to false. no usage in mobile

type.title: The article type
type.description: current article type. return 'article' if current type is story, else return type (content.type).

items.title: The items object. This only apply to article not photogallery type.
items.description: This only apply to article not photogallery type.

anyOf.description: photo element for lead_art photo position and photo embeds.
title element for current article. one element after lead_art
byline element for current article. one element after title
date element for current article. one element after byline
paragraph element for current article. one or more.
bio element for current article. at least one bio element before footer. if no bio info, a empty element required.
footer element for current article. one elment at end of items array.
gallery element for current article leadart gallery and gallery embed.
video element for current video article or story article leadart video and video embed.
oembed embed for current article.[currentcontent.type='oembed_response' and currentcontent.subtype is 'soundcloud' or'instagram']
oembed embed for current article.[currentcontent.type='oembed_response' and currentcontent.subtype is 'youtube']
list element for content.content_elements[x] item has type=list
quote element for content.content_elements[x] item has type=quote
element for content.content_elements[x] item has type=table|numeric_rating
photo element for gallery. currentcontent is content.content_elements[x]

accessLevel.title: The accessLevel
accessLevel.description: This value is based on pre-configured data match with content.content_restrictions.content_code. need mobile team input.

photo.title: Photo
photo.description: Data elment for leadart, photo embed and rawhtml youtube(logic defined later) with photo. for lead_art, the currenctcontent match content.promo.<leard_art||basic>, for photo embed the currentcontent math content.contentelements[x].type is 'image'

blurb.title: The blurb
examples: Then-Ald. Daniel Solis attends a Chicago City Council meeting in 2014.

credit.title: The credit
credit.description: no useage for this. always display empty string. mobile do not use it.

frompb.title: The frompb
frompb.description: no logic defined, default to false

fullcaption.title: The fullcaption
fullcaption.description: combine currentcontent.caption(strip html) and current content.credits.by[x].name(same logic as credit, uppercase), new line char between.
examples:
Then-Ald. Daniel Solis attends a Chicago City Council meeting in 2014.
NANCY STONE/CHICAGO TRIBUNE

instructions.title: The instructions
instructions.description: no logic find for this element, default to empty string. mobile do not use it

isBright.title: The isBright
isBright.description: no logic find for this element. default to false

message.title: The message
message.description: always display as 'save-snapfish-data', mobile do not use it

padding.title: The padding
padding.description: always display as null, mobile do not use it.

photographercredit.title: The photographercredit
photographercredit.description: ';'seprated string for all currentcontent.credits.by[x].name. default to empty string if no match.

socialImage.title: The socialImage
socialImage.description: if current photo item is a lead-art then render as 'true'. let's rendering false as default

photoSourceid.title: The photoSourceid
photoSourceid.description: currentcontent.source.source_id. if not match render as empty string.

photoSourceid.title: The photoSourceid
photoSourceid.description: currentcontent.source.source_id. if not match render as empty string.

gallery.title: the gallery element. currentcontent is content in gallery page, content.promo_items.lead_art for gallery lead art, content.content_elements[x] with type = gallery.

blurb.title: The gallery blurb
blurb.description: currentcontent.description.basic. if no match use currentcotnent.subheadlines.basic else render empty string. need unescape the text.
examples: Lincoln College, founded in 1865, has seen its finances devastated by the pandemic and a ransomware attack. If a hefty donation doesn’t come soon, its fate will be sealed.

title.title: The title
title.description: currentcontent.headlines.basic. if no match render empty string.
examples: Students hopeful for a miracle to save Lincoln College

contenturl.title: The gallery contenturl
contenturl.description: url is based on current market domain + currentcontent.websites[currentmarket].website_url, if no match, the whole element should be rendered.

anyOf.description: photo element for gallery. currentcontent is content.content_elements[x]

galleryCredit.title: The gallery Credit
galleryCredit.description: ',' seprated string to collect currentcontent.credites.by[x].name. if not match use currentcontent.additional_properties.credits.by[x].name, else use empty string.

galleryOwner.title: The gallery Owner
galleryOwner.description: currentcontent.additional_properties.playlist.owner. could not match this for our content. if not match render empty string.

gallerySource.title: The gallery Source
gallerySource.description: currentcontent.source.name, if no match render empty string.

gallerySourceid.title: The gallery Sourceid
gallerySourceid.description: currentcontent.source.source_id. if no match render empty string

galleryCredit.title: The gallery Credit
galleryCredit.description: ',' seprated string to collect currentcontent.credites.by[x].name. if not match use currentcontent.additional_properties.credits.by[x].name, else use empty string.

galleryOwner.title: The gallery Owner
galleryOwner.description: currentcontent.additional_properties.playlist.owner. could not match this for our content. if not match render empty string.

gallerySource.title: The gallery Source
gallerySource.description: currentcontent.source.name, if no match render empty string.

gallerySourceid.title: The gallery Sourceid
gallerySourceid.description: currentcontent.source.source_id. if no match render empty string

title.title: title
title.description: Data elmment for current article's title. it always rendering at top, after leadart if any.

content.title: The content headline
examples: After three years under wraps, ex-Ald. Daniel Solis’ unprecedented deal with the feds has gone public

mime.title: The mime type
mime.description: if headline contain '</' then set as 'text/html', else set s 'text/plain'.

content.title: The byline content
content.description:
upper(',' seprated string with each content.credits.by[x].name)
. if content.locaction exists then append '
upper(content.location)'.

mime.title: The mime type
mime.description: if byline contain '</' then set as 'text/html', else set s 'text/plain'. most likely, it is 'text/html'

date.title: The article date
date.description: The current article date element. it always display after byline element.

paragraph.title: paragraph
paragraph.description: paragraph element for content.content_elements[x] item has type=text/header/raw_html/interstitial_link, correction, interstital embed. copyright(not sure the logic)

content.title: The paragraph content
content.description: curentitem.content. if type=header, content should wrap with tag. if type=correction, content should wrap with tag. if type=raw_html, we need strip html tags in content if iframe is not part of content. If content contains iframe, the element should render as 'interactive_content'. if type=interstitial_link, the output format should be [currentcontent.content]
examples: It was the day after Christmas 2018 when retiring Chicago Ald. Daniel Solis signed a secret agreement with federal prosecutors admitting to taking bribes from real estate developers in exchange for his help on zoning issues.

mime.description: if headline contain '</' then set as 'text/html', else set s 'text/plain'. This is required for all paragraph elements unless currenttime.type=raw_html and content contains iframe. in this case, we should not display this element.

bio.title: The bio element
bio.description: The current article bio element. based on content.credits.by array, each item in the array has one element.

bio.title: The bio
bio.description: content.credits.by[x].bio, if no match rendering empty string. it should be empty for our content.

name.title: The name
name.description: content.credits.by[x].name. if no match rendering empty string.

role.title: The role
role.description: content.credits.by[x].role. if no match rendering empty string. it should be empty for our content.

content.title: The content
content.description: always render based on following format '© <current year> <current market name>'.

video.title: The video element
video.description: video details for video detail page, video leadart, and video embed.

blurb.title: The blurb
blurb.description: current video description. currentcontent.description.basic if no match display empty string.
examples: Tennis great Roger Federer greets fans in Millennium Park on Monday, March 19, 2018. (Terrence Antonio James/Chicago Tribune)

title.title: The title
title.description: currentcontent.headline.basic. if no match display empty string.
examples: Roger Federer greets fans in Millennium Park

fullcaption.title: The fullcaption
fullcaption.description: combine currentcontent.description.basic and current content.credits.by[x].name(same logic as credit, uppercase), new line char between.
examples: Tennis great Roger Federer greets fans in Millennium Park on Monday, March 19, 2018. (Terrence Antonio James/Chicago Tribune) VIDEOLICIOUS - CHICAGO TRIBUNE

credits.title: The credits
credits.description: no useage for this. always display empty string. mobile do not use it.

imageURL.title: The imageURL
imageURL.description: currentcontent.promo_items.url, if no match, use currentcontent.promo_items.basic.url. default to empty string.

contenturl.title: The content url
contenturl.description: return url from selected item under currentcontent.streams which bitrate equal 600 and stream_type is 'mp4', if no match use bitrate 1200, if still no match, render empty string.

height.title: The height
height.description: height attribute from the same stream item used for contenturl.

width.title: The width schema
width.description: width attribute from the same stream item used for contenturl.

duration.title: The duration
duration.description: curentcontent.duration. if curentcontent.duration does not exist, do not display this element.

videoSlug.title: The videoSlug
videoSlug.description: currentcontent.slgu, if no match render empty string.

videoOwner.title: The videoOwner
videoOwner.description: curtentcontent.additional_properties.playlist. if value exists, the value need to translate to readable market name not code.

videoClassification.title: The videoClassification
videoClassification.description: curtentcontent.additional_properties.classification. if not match return empty string.

additionalProperties.title: The additionalProperties schema
additionalProperties.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

videoSlug.title: The videoSlug
videoSlug.description: currentcontent.slgu, if no match render empty string.

videoOwner.title: The videoOwner schema
videoOwner.description: curtentcontent.additional_properties.playlist. the value need to translate to readable market name not code.

videoClassification.title: The videoClassification
videoClassification.description: curtentcontent.additional_properties.classification. if not match return empty string.

html.title: html code
examples:
View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Kurt Gessler (@kurtgessler)

content.description: twitter embed also has this content element. not sure it is used in mobile or not. mobile team is determine the usage. leave as empty object ('{}') for twitter, otherwise do not include this element.
content.title: content details.

youtube.title: youtube oembed
youtube.description: element for type='oembed_repsonse' and subtype='youtube'. The current logic seems much more complex. trying to remap.

blurb.title: The blurb
examples: How to craft engaging digital headlines

html.title: The html
examples: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yfoW5cgyWwM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

title.title: The title
examples: How to craft engaging digital headlines

list.title: paragraph
list.description: list element for content.content_elements[x] item has type=list)

quote.title: paragraph
quote.description: paragraph element for content.content_elements[x] item has type=quote

content.title: The quote content
content.description: space seprated string with all curentitem.content_elements[x].content.

mime.description: if quote content contain '</' then set as 'text/html', else set s 'text/plain'.

subtype.title: The subtype
subtype.description: display this as currentcontent.subtype if currentcontent.subtype is not pullquote, pullquote do not require subtyope, do not display.

type.title: The type
type.description: display as 'pull_quote' if currentcontent.subtype is not pullquote; otherwise, always render as 'quote'

placement.title: The placement
placement.description: currentcontent.alignment, if not exist, do not display.

asis-item.description: element for content.content_elements[x] item has type=table|numeric_rating, please rendering table element as is without reformat.
